column4: hi all of a sudden I've lost sound on my laptop and all the multimedia applications are simply hanging now
I am using ubuntu gusty
please explain what all you did or installed prior to the problem
: as far as i can remember i've run update-manager
Have you added any custom repos?  as in NON-standard ones
no.. not universe..  here run this..  sudo apt-get install pastebinit  && cat /etc/apt/sources.list | pastebinit (Provide Pastebin link in channel)
here is the link http://pastebin.com/d2fc84707
Problem was easy to spot.. you used automatix.. and the upgrade borked you ..
but I've rarely used automatix directly
I guarantee that is your problem and unless you have a backup prior to using/installing automatix.  I dont have any solutions
Constantly have people with that issue
But I see every time what update-manager is installing nothing sound related was upgraded before losing it
Your source list has feisty repos, gutsy repos automatix repos plus backports
Sorry, cant help with your situation..
Thanks for your time I'll dig deeper into it
if not under home you will need sudo
I am root on the server
you may have the path wrong
setting a root pw is not advised
: rm says there is not such file are directory but ls displays it
I cant help with that mess, not sure what happened to that
